heading: Sunday
text: A mix of sun and clouds north and east of I-89, more clouds and a chance for snow showers south and west. Highs in the low to mid 30s. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Snow showers after midnight south of Route 4. Lows from near 10 and low teens in the northeast, and mid teens to near 20 elsewhere. Light and variable wind.

heading: Monday
text: Widespread snow spreading north to around route 2. Highest totals in the southeast and over the Greens. Acculumations range from 1-2 south of the international border to 4-6 inches across the lower greens. Over half a foot possible in the Upper Valley. Highs from the upper 20s to low 30s. Northeast winds increasing to over 15 mph gusting to 25.
